title: errors=1, failures=4  from  _DL_DEVEL_ANNEX=1 mode on 0.11.x cron job

labels.name: fix-implemented
labels.description: A fix is available, but has not been merged or released, yet.

body:

failures suggest upcoming change in git-annex behavior/output
